description.bfr.fusion_reactor_controlle: The controlling block for the entire Fusion Reactor structure.
description.bfr.fusion_reactor_frame: Reinforced framing that can be used in the Fusion Reactor multiblock.
description.bfr.fusion_reactor_logic_ada: A block that can be used to allow basic monitoring of a reactor using redstone.
description.bfr.fusion_reactor_port: A block of reinforced framing that is capable of managing both the gas and energy transfer of the Fusion Reactor.
description.bfr.laser_focus_matrix: A panel of Fusion Reactor Glass that is capable of absorbing optical energy and thereby heating up the Fusion Reactor.
description.bfr.reactor.logic.activation: Activate the reactor when powered, and deactivate when unpowered
description.bfr.reactor.logic.capacity: Output when the reactor's core heat capacity has been met
description.bfr.reactor.logic.damaged: Output when the reactor reaches critical damage levels (100%+).
description.bfr.reactor.logic.depleted: Output when the reactor has insufficient fuel to sustain a reaction
description.bfr.reactor.logic.efficiency: 100% = full redstone signal strength (15 blocks). 1 block ~ 7%
description.bfr.reactor.logic.error_leve: 100% = full redstone signal strength (15 blocks). 1 block ~ 7%
description.bfr.reactor.logic.excess_was: Output when the reactor has excess waste
description.bfr.reactor.logic.reactivity: Redstone impulse will decrease CR by the strength of impulse (1-15)
Redstone impulse will increase CR by the strength of impulse (1-15)
description.bfr.reactor.logic.ready: Output when the reactor has reached the required heat level to ignite
description.bfr.reactor.logic.temperatur: Output when the reactor reaches dangerous temperatures
description.bfr.reactor_glass: Reinforced glass that can be used in the Fission Reactor and Fusion Reactor multiblocks (as well as any others!).
reactor.bfr.configurator.port_eject: Toggled Reactor Port eject mode to: %1$s.
reactor.bfr.efficiency.laser_min_energy_: Avoid negative effects of Hm (1 minute)
